name: Exorcism Ritual
description:
Exorcism Ritual

Is an Indonesian Horror Game where you can face an enemy based on Indonesian urban legend, and give different experiences instead of making the main character defenseless, we provide various weapons that you can buy from the merchant.

Synopsis

In a competitive world, Ki Indra is a Social Slave who has spent his life dedicated to make people impressed with his wealth and his success story.
To keep people always praising him, even though in 100 years, they'll decompose and be forgotten, he decided to buy 100 sports cars by exorcising a mysterious mansion at Alas Roban.

Key of Features

First Person - experience thriller through a first-person perspective.
Merchant - feature where you can buy ammo, syringe, and weapon.
Puzzles - we're providing some puzzles to make the game more fluid.
